description:
Chidori, the Iga shinobi, may only be a child, but was already a skilled shinobi. One day, her master gets a request from Oda Nobunaga to send some shinobi to work for him.  Chidori is picked to go, and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: À la rencontre du seigneur Nobunaga
信長様に会いに行こう
